A tool for managing your web3 and metaverse avatars and assets, in the convenience of a browser extension!

Upload your 3D assets to Loadout and take them with you across metaverse environments.

Browse featured CC0 assets and add them to your Loadouts.

Visit our featured Worlds to put your loadouts into action!
